name: Hex-Rays IDA License
summary: A HEXLIC file is a license file used by IDA Pro or IDA Free, which are interactive disassemblers developed by Hex-Rays. It stores license information that activates a specific edition of the software, allowing users to run the disassembler beyond trial limitations or to unlock additional features, depending on the license type.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
